text:
We have seen an alarming spike in domestic violence reports during the COVID crisis.

The COVID-19 DV task force chaired by @melissadderosa has issued recommendations that NY will adopt.

We will make services more survivor centered and individualized.
https://t.co/K9o9qvKsvu
